function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential tourists perceiving risks relative to the COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Decreased tourism and economic impact","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures, provide accurate information, and promote trust","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and communication platforms","People":"Potential tourists, local residents, and businesses","Owner":"Tourism industry associations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of psychological distance and construal level theory on tourism behavior","Impact":"Misinterpretation of risk and decision-making","Mitigation":"Educate tourists on accurate risk assessment and provide clear communication on safety measures","Technologies":"Online information systems, virtual tours, and augmented reality apps","People":"Potential tourists, tour operators, and travel agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, tourism industry associations"},{"Description":"Negative impact on the research context due to misinterpretation of psychological distance and perceived risk","Impact":"Unreliable research findings and proposed opportunities","Mitigation":"Ensure clear definitions and measurement of psychological distance and perceived risk in research methodologies","Technologies":"Data analytics and research tools","People":"Research scholars, academic institutions, and funding bodies","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
